text: Yastai kisimale hamile manisaharula'i tiniharuko halabata khabaradara gareka chaum taki tiniharule thaha pa'un, ki allahako vacana purai satya cha, ra kiyamatako dinama kunai sanka chaina, tyasabela jaba manisaharule tinako sambandhama apasama vivada gariraheka thi'e ta kehile bhanna thale ki tiniharuko guphamathi e'uta bhavana bana'ihala. Tiniharuko palanakarta nai tiniharuko hala ramrari jandacha. Juna manisaharule tiniharumathi varcasva pa'e, bhanna thale ki hamile tiniharuko sthanamathi masjidako nirmana garnechaum
